name: A time, A place, A Gaius
name_original: A time, A place, A Gaius
description:
A time, a place, a Gauis is a simulation game that lets the player explore an ancient roman theater.

Give your opinion of the game here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1VCbf1nVEdPv9DPVLc...

Team:

Ryan => 3D artist

Vincent => Voice acting & Lead Playtester

Kevin => Artist & Game Design & Programming

Esther => GameDesign & Programming
